SELECT po.id, po.platform_service_provider AS 'tax_name', po.worker_money, po.company_contract, po.payment_inventory, po.task_id, po.acceptance_certificate, po.payment_order_status, po.payment_mode, po.real_money, po.create_date, ci.company_name, ci.bank_name AS 'payment_bank_name', ci.bank_code AS 'payment_bank_code', tp.payee, tp.bank_name AS 'payee_bank_name', tp.bank_code AS 'payee_bank_code' FROM tb_payment_order po LEFT JOIN tb_tax_package tp ON po.tax_id = tp.tax_id AND tp.package_status = 0 LEFT JOIN tb_company_info ci ON po.company_id = ci.id WHERE po.id = #{paymentOrderId}
